message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money 55/45.
Your turn! I'm feeling generous, so I'm offering you the same deal you offered me, but with our positions reversed.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than 45$.  Let's split it 60/40.
Okay, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical outcome.  Every round is costing us both money.
